amendment.description: Amendment ensures that all home schooled children will be considered as eligible applicants for the Robert C. Byrd Honors Scholarship Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 109-399 to include all home school children as eligible applicants for the Robert C. Byrd Honors Scholarship Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Musgrave amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mrs. Musgrave.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Musgrave amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
